categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This young Jedi was a young brown-haired Human female who served the Jedi Order in the rank of Padawan during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. She trained alongside Masters Lanius Qel-Bertuk and Kirlocca at the Almas Academy. She wielded an orange-bladed lightsaber during combat.
